name: A Game in Which You Sling Hamburgers in a Fashion Reminiscent of The Arcade Game Tapper
name_original: A Game in Which You Sling Hamburgers in a Fashion Reminiscent of The Arcade Game Tapper
description:
The masses are restless. They look upon your unconventional burger shoppe with drooling maws and rumbling stomachs. Live up to your father's legacy and provide hot, fresh burgers until you get bored and play a better game. 

THE RULES OF BURGERING, IGNORE ON PENALTY OF DEATH:

1) Move between counters with Up/Down or W/S. Press Space to Grill, and press Space again to serve

2) A burger thrown must always be received by a customer

3) A customer must never reach the chef
